trans-unit.source: The ansible-config utility allows users to see all the configuration settings available, their defaults, how to set them and where their current value comes from. See ansible-config for more information.
trans-unit.target: 该 ansible-config 实用程序允许用户看到所有的配置设置可用，它们的默认值，如何设置并在其目前的价值的来源。有关更多信息，请参见ansible-config。

trans-unit.source: The ansible-galaxy command comes bundled with Ansible, and you can use it to install roles from Galaxy or directly from a git based SCM. You can also use it to create a new role, remove roles, or perform tasks on the Galaxy website.
trans-unit.target: 该 ansible-galaxy 命令捆绑了Ansible，你可以用它来安装银河或直接从混帐基于SCM的作用。您也可以使用它在Galaxy网站上创建新角色，删除角色或执行任务。

trans-unit.source: The ansible-galaxy command ignores any pre-release versions unless the == range identifier is used to explicitly set to that pre-release version.
trans-unit.target: 所述 ansible-galaxy 命令忽略任何预发布版本，除非 == 范围标识符用于显式地设置为预发布版本。

trans-unit.source: The ansible-pull is a small script that will checkout a repo of configuration instructions from git, and then run ansible-playbook against that content.
trans-unit.target: 该 ansible-pull 是一个小脚本，将检出从git的配置说明回购，然后运行 ansible-playbook 对这些内容。

trans-unit.source: The ansible-vault command provides encryption for files and/or individual variables like passwords. This tutorial will show you how to encrypt a single SSH password. You can use the commands below to encrypt other sensitive information, such as database passwords, privilege-escalation passwords and more.
trans-unit.target: 所述 ansible-vault 命令提供加密的文件和/或类似的密码各个变量。本教程将向您展示如何加密单个SSH密码。您可以使用以下命令来加密其他敏感信息，例如数据库密码，特权升级密码等。

trans-unit.source: The ansible.netcommon.cli_command also supports multiple prompts.
trans-unit.target: 该 ansible.netcommon.cli_command 还支持多个提示。

trans-unit.source: The ansible.netcommon.native and ansible.netcommon.json parsing engines are fully supported with a Red Hat Ansible Automation Platform subscription. Red Hat Ansible Automation Platform subscription support is limited to the use of the ntc_templates, pyATS, textfsm, xmltodict, public APIs as documented.
trans-unit.target: 该 ansible.netcommon.native 和 ansible.netcommon.json 解析引擎与红帽Ansible自动化平台订阅完全支持。红帽Ansible自动化平台订阅支持仅限于记录的 ntc_templates ，pyATS， textfsm ， xmltodict 和公共API的使用。

trans-unit.source: The ansible_connection: local has been deprecated. Please use one of the persistent connection types listed above instead. With persistent connections, you can define the hosts and credentials only once, rather than in every task. You also need to set the network_os variable for the specific network platform you are communicating with. For more details on using each connection type on various platforms, see the platform-specific pages.
trans-unit.target: 该 ansible_connection: local 已被弃用。请改用上面列出的持久连接类型之一。使用持久性连接，您只能定义一次主机和凭据，而不是在每个任务中都定义一次。您还需要为与之通信的特定网络平台设置 network_os 变量。有关在各种平台上使用每种连接类型的更多详细信息，请参阅特定于平台的页面。

trans-unit.source: The ansible_distribution_release and ansible_distribution_version facts on OpenBSD hosts were reversed in Ansible 2.2 and earlier. This has been changed so that version has the numeric portion and release has the name of the release.
trans-unit.target: OpenBSD主机上的 ansible_distribution_release 和 ansible_distribution_version 事实在Ansible 2.2及更早版本中已被逆转。对此进行了更改，以便版本具有数字部分，发行版具有发行版的名称。

trans-unit.source: The ansible_shell_type variable should reflect the DefaultShell configured on the Windows host. Set to cmd for the default shell or set to powershell if the DefaultShell has been changed to PowerShell.

trans-unit.source: The any_errors_fatal option will end the play and prevent any subsequent plays from running. When an error is encountered, all hosts in the current batch are given the opportunity to finish the fatal task and then the execution of the play stops. any_errors_fatal can be set at the play or block level:
trans-unit.target: 该 any_errors_fatal 选项将结束游戏，并防止任何后续的戏剧运行。当遇到错误时，当前批处理中的所有主机都将有机会完成致命任务，然后停止执行播放。可以在播放或块级别设置 any_errors_fatal ：

trans-unit.source: The apt module now honors update_cache=false while installing its own dependency and skips the cache update. Explicitly setting update_cache=true or omitting the param update_cache will result in a cache update while installing its own dependency.
trans-unit.target: 该 apt 模块现在荣誉 update_cache=false 而安装自己的依赖，并跳过缓存更新。显式设置 update_cache=true 或省略参数 update_cache 将导致在安装自己的依赖项时进行缓存更新。

trans-unit.source: The args argument provides a set of arguments for the RPC call and are encoded in the request message. This argument accepts a set of key=value arguments.
trans-unit.target: 所述 args 参数提供一组用于RPC调用参数和在该请求消息进行编码。此参数接受一组key = value参数。

trans-unit.source: The assert module to check configuration and operational state compliance

trans-unit.source: The assertonly provider has been deprecated in Ansible 2.9 and will be removed in Ansible 2.13. Please see the examples on how to emulate it with openssl_certificate_info, openssl_csr_info, openssl_privatekey_info and assert.
trans-unit.target: 该 assertonly 提供商已过时，Ansible 2.9，将在Ansible 2.13被删除。请参见有关如何使用openssl_certificate_info，openssl_csr_info，openssl_privatekey_info和assert进行仿真的示例。

trans-unit.source: The assertonly provider has been deprecated in Ansible 2.9 and will be removed in community.crypto 2.0.0. Please see the examples on how to emulate it with community.crypto.x509_certificate_info, community.crypto.openssl_csr_info, community.crypto.openssl_privatekey_info and ansible.builtin.assert.
trans-unit.target: 该 assertonly 提供商已过时，Ansible 2.9，将在community.crypto 2.0.0被删除。请参阅有关如何使用community.crypto.x509_certificate_info，community.crypto.openssl_csr_info，community.crypto.openssl_privatekey_info和ansible.builtin.assert进行仿真的示例。

trans-unit.source: The assertonly provider is intended for use cases where one is only interested in checking properties of a supplied certificate. Please note that this provider has been deprecated in Ansible 2.9 and will be removed in Ansible 2.13. See the examples on how to emulate assertonly usage with openssl_certificate_info, openssl_csr_info, openssl_privatekey_info and assert. This also allows more flexible checks than the ones offered by the assertonly provider.
trans-unit.target: 该 assertonly 提供适用于使用案例，其中一个只在检查提供的证书的性质有关。请注意，此提供程序已在Ansible 2.9中弃用，并将在Ansible 2.13中删除。请参阅有关如何使用openssl_certificate_info，openssl_csr_info，openssl_privatekey_info和assert来模拟 assertonly 用法的示例。与 assertonly 提供程序所提供的检查相比，这还允许更灵活的检查。

trans-unit.source: The assertonly provider is intended for use cases where one is only interested in checking properties of a supplied certificate. trans-unit.source: The auto inventory plugin can be used to automatically determines which inventory plugin to use for a YAML configuration file. It can also be used for inventory plugins in a collection.
trans-unit.target: 的 auto 库存插件可以被用于自动地确定要用于一个YAML配置文件，该文件清单插件。它也可以用于集合中的清单插件。

trans-unit.source: The auto inventory plugin is enabled by default and works by using the plugin field to indicate the plugin that should attempt to parse it. You can configure the whitelist/precedence of inventory plugins used to parse source using the ansible.cfg [‘inventory’] enable_plugins list. After enabling the plugin and providing any required options, you can view the populated inventory with ansible-inventory -i demo.aws_ec2.yml --graph:
trans-unit.target: 该 auto 库存插件默认启用，通过使用作品 plugin 领域，以表明应该尝试分析它的插件。您可以使用 ansible.cfg ['inventory'] enable_plugins 列表配置用于解析源的清单插件的白名单/优先级。启用插件并提供所有必需的选项后，您可以使用 ansible-inventory -i demo.aws_ec2.yml --graph 查看填充的清单：

trans-unit.source: The auto provider will select the proper provider if path otherwise it scans all the other providers based on the product_id.

trans-unit.source: The backup argument will backup the current device's active configuration to the Ansible control host prior to making any changes. trans-unit.source: The collections keyword lets you define a list of collections that your role or playbook should search for unqualified module and action names. So you can use the collections keyword, then simply refer to modules and action plugins by their short-form names throughout that role or playbook.

trans-unit.source: The collections keyword merely creates an ordered ‘search path’ for non-namespaced plugin and role references. It does not install content or otherwise change Ansible’s behavior around the loading of plugins or roles. Note that an FQCN is still required for non-action or module plugins (for example, lookups, filters, tests).
trans-unit.target: 该 collections 关键字仅仅创造了非命名空间插件和角色引用一个有序的搜索路径“。它不会安装内容或以其他方式更改Ansible在加载插件或角色时的行为。请注意，非动作或模块插件（例如，查找，过滤器，测试）仍需要FQCN。

trans-unit.source: The conditional_bare_variables setting does not affect nested variables. Any string value assigned to a subkey is already respected and not treated as a boolean. If complex_variable['subkey'] is a non-empty string, then when: complex_variable['subkey'] is always True and when: not complex_variable['subkey'] is always False. If you want a string subkey like complex_variable['subkey'] to be evaluated as a boolean, you must use the bool filter.
trans-unit.target: 该 conditional_bare_variables 设置不影响嵌套的变量。分配给子项的任何字符串值都已经被接受，并且不视为布尔值。如果 complex_variable['subkey'] 是非空字符串，则以下 when: complex_variable['subkey'] 始终为 True ,而 when: not complex_variable['subkey'] 始终为 False 。如果希望将像 complex_variable['subkey'] 这样的字符串子项评估为布尔值，则必须使用 bool 过滤器。

trans-unit.source: The conditions for a default rule are all.
trans-unit.target: 默认规则的 conditions 是 all 。

trans-unit.source: The config argument allows the playbook designer to supply the base configuration to be used to validate configuration changes necessary. If this argument is provided, the module will not download the running-config from the remote node.
trans-unit.target: 所述 config 参数允许剧本设计者提供基本配置被用于验证配置更改必要的。如果提供此参数，则模块将不会从远程节点下载running-config。

trans-unit.source: The config argument specifies the base configuration to use to compare against the desired configuration. If this value is not specified, the module will automatically retrieve the current active configuration from the remote device.
trans-unit.target: 所述 config 参数指定用于比较针对所期望的配置的基本配置。如果未指定此值，则模块将自动从远程设备检索当前的活动配置。

trans-unit.source: The confirm argument will configure a time out value in minutes for the commit to be confirmed before it is automatically rolled back. If the confirm argument is set to False, this argument is silently ignored. If the value for this argument is set to 0, the commit is confirmed immediately.
trans-unit.target: 该 confirm 参数将在几分钟内配置的超时值在提交前会自动回滚到确认。如果 confirm 参数设置为False，则该参数将被静默忽略。如果此参数的值设置为0，则立即确认提交。

trans-unit.source: The content is a query parameter that controls how descendant nodes of the requested data nodes in path will be processed in the reply. If value is config return only configuration descendant data nodes of value in path. If value is nonconfig return only non-configuration descendant data nodes of value in path. If value is all return all descendant data nodes of value in path
trans-unit.target: 的 content 是一个查询参数控制后代如何在所请求的数据的节点的节点 path 将在应答中进行处理。如果value为config，则仅返回 path 中value的配置子节点数据节点。如果value为nonconfig，则仅在 path 中返回value的非配置后代数据节点。如果value为all，则返回 path 中value的所有后代数据节点

trans-unit.source: The delegate_to and loop arguments, used together, cause Ansible to loop over each monitoring server and load balancer, and perform that operation (delegate that operation) on the monitoring or load balancing server, “on behalf” of the webserver. In programming terms, the outer loop is the list of web servers, and the inner loop is the list of monitoring servers.
trans-unit.target: 的 delegate_to 和 loop 参数，一起使用，原因Ansible遍历每个监视服务器和负载平衡器，以及执行该操作（委派操作）上的“代表”的网络服务器的监视或负载平衡服务器，。用编程术语来说，外循环是Web服务器的列表，内循环是监视服务器的列表。

trans-unit.source: The enable_dns_express and enable_zone_transfer settings on a DNS profile affect how the system responds to zone transfer requests.
trans-unit.target: DNS配置文件上的 enable_dns_express 和 enable_zone_transfer 设置会影响系统如何响应区域传输请求。

trans-unit.target: 该 encrypted_password 参数设置已经为远程系统上的用户帐户的密码散列。

trans-unit.source: The environment keyword allows you to set an environment varaible for the action to be taken on the remote target. For example, it is quite possible that you may need to set a proxy for a task that does http requests. Or maybe a utility or script that are called may also need certain environment variables set to run properly.
trans-unit.target: 该 environment 关键字可以设置环境varaible对要采取的行动对远程目标。例如，您很有可能需要为执行http请求的任务设置代理。也许调用的实用程序或脚本可能还需要设置某些环境变量才能正常运行。

trans-unit.source: The environment keyword does not work with raw normally, it requires a shell which means it only works if executable is set or using the module with privilege escalation (become).
trans-unit.target: 该 environment 关键字不起作用与原正常，它需要一个壳，这意味着如果它只能 executable 设置或使用该模块权限提升（ become ）。

trans-unit.source: The environment keyword does not work with this task
trans-unit.target: 该 environment 关键字不完成这个任务的工作

The foreman and katello modules have been deprecated in favor of a set of modules that are broken out per entity with better idempotency in mind.

trans-unit.source: The git_config module changes git configuration by invoking ‘git config’. This is needed if you don’t want to use ansible.builtin.template for the entire git config file (e.g. because you need to change just user.email in /etc/.git/config). Solutions involving ansible.builtin.command are cumbersome or don’t work correctly in check mode.

trans-unit.source: The http argument controls the operating state of the HTTP transport protocol when eAPI is present in the running-config. When the value is set to True, the HTTP protocol is enabled and when the value is set to False, the HTTP protocol is disabled. By default, when eAPI is first configured, the HTTP protocol is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 当eAPI存在于running-config中时， http 参数控制HTTP传输协议的操作状态。当该值设置为True时，启用HTTP协议，而当该值设置为False时，禁用HTTP协议。缺省情况下，首次配置eAPI时，禁用HTTP协议。

trans-unit.source: The httpapi connection plugin has a send() method, but an httpapi plugin needs a send_request(self, data, **message_kwargs) method as a higher-level wrapper to send(). This method should prepare requests by adding fixed values like common headers or URL root paths. This method may do more complex work such as turning data into formatted payloads, or determining which path or method to request. It may then also unpack responses to be more easily consumed by the caller.
trans-unit.target: 所述 httpapi 连接插件有一个 send() 的方法，但一个httpapi插件需要一个 send_request(self, data, **message_kwargs) 方法作为更高级别的封装器 send() 。此方法应通过添加固定值（例如通用标头或URL根路径）来准备请求。此方法可能会执行更复杂的工作，例如将数据转换为格式化的有效负载，或者确定要请求的路径或方法。然后，它也可以解压缩响应，以使呼叫者更容易使用它。

trans-unit.source: The https argument controls the operating state of the HTTPS transport protocol when eAPI is present in the running-config. When the value is set to True, the HTTPS protocol is enabled and when the value is set to False, the HTTPS protocol is disabled. By default, when eAPI is first configured, the HTTPS protocol is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 当eAPI存在于running-config中时， https 参数控制HTTPS传输协议的操作状态。将该值设置为True时，将启用HTTPS协议，而将该值设置为False时，将禁用HTTPS协议。默认情况下，首次配置eAPI时，将启用HTTPS协议。

trans-unit.source: The human_readable and human_to_bytes functions let you test your playbooks to make sure you are using the right size format in your tasks - that you’re providing Byte format to computers and human-readable format to people.
trans-unit.target: 使用 human_readable 和 human_to_bytes 函数，您可以测试剧本，以确保在任务中使用正确的大小格式-向计算机提供字节格式，向人们提供可读格式。

trans-unit.source: The human_readable and human_to_bytes functions let you test your playbooks to make sure you are using the right size format in your tasks, and that you provide Byte format to computers and human-readable format to people.
trans-unit.target: 该 human_readable 和 human_to_bytes 功能让你测试你的剧本，以确保您使用的是正确大小格式在您的任务，以及您提供字节格式计算机和人类可读格式的人。

trans-unit.source: The ignore_errors directive only works when the task is able to run and returns a value of ‘failed’. It does not make Ansible ignore undefined variable errors, connection failures, execution issues (for example, missing packages), or syntax errors.
trans-unit.target: 该 ignore_errors 指令只有当任务能够运行和返回的“失败”的值工作。它不会使Ansible忽略未定义的变量错误，连接失败，执行问题（例如，缺少包）或语法错误。

trans-unit.source: The import-security option classifies for the external EPG. The rules and contracts defined in this external EPG apply to networks matching this subnet.
trans-unit.target: 在 import-security 选项分类为外部EPG。此外部EPG中定义的规则和合同适用于与该子网匹配的网络。

trans-unit.source: The import command requires that you first authenticate using the login command. Once authenticated you can import any GitHub repository that you own or have been granted access.
trans-unit.target: 在 import 命令要求您在使用第一身份验证 login 命令。通过身份验证后，您可以导入您拥有或已被授予访问权的任何GitHub存储库。

trans-unit.source: The include tasks can be static or dynamic, this toggles the default expected behaviour if autodetection fails and it is not explicitly set in task.
trans-unit.target: 该 include 任务可以是静态或动态的，如果自动检测失败这样可以在默认的预期的行为，并没有明确的任务设置。

trans-unit.source: The include_role option was introduced in Ansible 2.3. The usage has changed slightly as of Ansible 2.4 to match the include (dynamic) vs. import (static) usage. See Dynamic vs. Static for more details.
trans-unit.target: 该 include_role 选项在Ansible 2.3推出。自Ansible 2.4起，用法已略有变化，以匹配包含（动态）与导入（静态）用法。有关更多详细信息，请参见动态与静态。

trans-unit.source: The intended_config provides the master configuration that the node should conform to and is used to check the final running-config against.
trans-unit.target: 所述 intended_config 提供主配置该节点应符合并用于所要检查的最终运行配置。

trans-unit.source: The intended_config provides the master configuration that the node should conform to and is used to check the final running-config against. This argument will not modify any settings on the remote device and is strictly used to check the compliance of the current device's configuration against. When specifying this argument, the task should also modify the diff_against value and set it to intended.
trans-unit.target: 所述 intended_config 提供主配置该节点应符合并用于所要检查的最终运行配置。此参数不会修改远程设备上的任何设置，并且严格用于检查当前设备配置的符合性。指定此参数时，任务还应修改 diff_against 值并将其设置为预期值。

trans-unit.source: The intended_config provides the master configuration the node should conform to and is used to check the final running-config against.
trans-unit.target: 所述 intended_config 提供主配置的节点应符合并用于所要检查的最终运行配置。

trans-unit.target: 在您的剧本中使用此模块之前， interface_profile 必须存在。所述cisco.aci.aci_interface_policy_leaf_profile模块可以用于此目的。

trans-unit.source: The intersight_facts module was renamed to intersight_info.
trans-unit.target: 该 intersight_facts 模块更名为intersight_info。

trans-unit.source: The inventory_file and inventory_dir magic variables are not available for the implicit localhost as they are dependent on each inventory host.
trans-unit.target: 该 inventory_file 和 inventory_dir 魔术变量不适用于隐含localhost作为它们依赖于每个库存主机。

trans-unit.source: The inventory_file remains mostly unchanged, as it was always host specific.
trans-unit.target: 该 inventory_file 大部分保持不变，因为它总是主机具体。

trans-unit.source: The invocation.module_args key shows the actual values that were set as well as other possible values that were not set. Unfortunately this will not show the default value for a DSC property, only what was set from the Ansible task. Any *_password option will be masked in the output for security reasons, if there are any other sensitive module options, set no_log: True on the task to stop all task output from being logged.
trans-unit.target: 该 invocation.module_args 键显示，设定，以及未设置的其他可能的值实际值。不幸的是，这将不会显示DSC属性的默认值，而只会显示在Ansible任务中设置的默认值。出于安全原因，任何 *_password 选项都将在输出中被屏蔽，如果还有其他敏感模块选项，请在任务上设置 no_log: True 以停止记录所有任务输出。

trans-unit.source: The ipa_user module originally always sent password to FreeIPA regardless of whether the password changed. Now the module only sends password if update_password is set to always, which is the default.
trans-unit.target: 最初， ipa_user 模块始终将 password 发送给FreeIPA，而不管密码是否更改。现在，仅当 update_password 设置为 always 时，模块才发送 password ，这是默认值。

trans-unit.source: The ipaddr() filter migrated to the ansible.netcommon collection. Follow the installation instructions to install that collection.
trans-unit.target: 该 ipaddr() 过滤器迁移到ansible.netcommon集合。按照安装说明安装该集合。

trans-unit.source: The ipmath() filter can be used to do simple IP math/arithmetic.
trans-unit.target: 该 ipmath() 过滤器可以用来做简单的数学IP /算术。

trans-unit.source: The ipsubnet() filter can be used to manipulate network subnets in several ways.
trans-unit.target: 该 ipsubnet() 过滤器可用于操纵网络子网在几个方面。

trans-unit.source: The items2dict filter is the reverse of the dict2items filter.
trans-unit.target: 所述 items2dict 滤波器是相反 dict2items 滤波器。

trans-unit.source: The jenkins_job_facts module was renamed to jenkins_job_info.
trans-unit.target: 该 jenkins_job_facts 模块更名为jenkins_job_info。

trans-unit.source: The jenkins_script module takes a script plus a dict of values to use within the script and returns the result of the script being run.
trans-unit.target: 该 jenkins_script 模块需要一个脚本加上值在脚本中使用的字典，并返回脚本正在运行的结果。

trans-unit.source: The k8s lookup plugin may not accept resources where the api_version has been changed to match the shortened version in the Kubernetes Python client. You should now specify the proper full Kubernetes api_version for a resource.
trans-unit.target: 该 k8s 查找插件可能无法接受这样的资源 api_version 已经改变以匹配Kubernetes Python客户端的缩短版。现在，您应该为资源指定适当的完整Kubernetes api_version 。

trans-unit.source: The k8s lookup plugin now supports all Kubernetes resources including those from Custom Resource Definitions and aggregated API servers. This includes all OpenShift resources.
trans-unit.target: 该 k8s 查找插件现在支持所有Kubernetes资源，包括那些从自定义资源的定义和聚集API服务器。这包括所有OpenShift资源。

trans-unit.source: The k8s lookup plugin will no longer remove secrets from the Ansible return values (and by extension the log). In order to prevent secret values in a task from being logged, specify the no_log parameter on the task block.
trans-unit.target: 该 k8s 查找插件将不再从Ansible返回值（通过扩展日志）中删除秘密。为了防止记录任务中的秘密值，请在任务块上指定 no_log 参数。

trans-unit.source: The k8s module can now process multi-document YAML files if they are passed with the src parameter. It will process each document as a separate resource. Resources provided inline with the resource_definition parameter must still be a single document.
trans-unit.target: 该 k8s 如果它们与传递模块现在可以处理多文档YAML文件 src 参数。它将每个文档作为单独的资源进行处理。与 resource_definition 参数一起内联提供的资源必须仍然是单个文档。

trans-unit.source: The k8s module may not accept resources where the api_version has been changed to match the shortened version in the Kubernetes Python client. You should now specify the proper full Kubernetes api_version for a resource.
trans-unit.target: 该 k8s 模块可能无法接受这样的资源 api_version 已经改变以匹配Kubernetes Python客户端的缩短版。现在，您应该为资源指定适当的完整Kubernetes api_version 。

trans-unit.source: The k8s module supports all Kubernetes resources including those from Custom Resource Definitions and aggregated API servers. This includes all OpenShift resources.
trans-unit.target: 该 k8s 模块支持所有Kubernetes资源，包括那些从自定义资源的定义和聚集API服务器。这包括所有OpenShift资源。

trans-unit.source: The k8s module will not accept resources where subkeys have been snake_cased. This was a workaround that was suggested with the k8s_raw and openshift_raw modules.
trans-unit.target: 该 k8s 模块将不会接受这样子项已snake_cased资源。这是 k8s_raw 和 openshift_raw 模块建议的解决方法。

trans-unit.source: The k8s module will not automatically change Project creation requests into ProjectRequest creation requests as the openshift_raw module did. You must now specify the ProjectRequest kind explicitly.
trans-unit.target: 该 k8s 模块将不会自动更改 Project 创建请求到 ProjectRequest 创建请求作为 openshift_raw 模块一样。现在，您必须明确指定 ProjectRequest 类型。

trans-unit.source: The k8s module will not automatically remove secrets from the Ansible return values (and by extension the log). In order to prevent secret values in a task from being logged, specify the no_log parameter on the task block.
trans-unit.target: 该 k8s 模块不会自动从Ansible返回值（通过扩展日志）中删除秘密。为了防止记录任务中的秘密值，请在任务块上指定 no_log 参数。

trans-unit.source: The k8s_facts module was renamed to k8s_info.
trans-unit.target: 该 k8s_facts 模块更名为k8s_info。

trans-unit.source: The k8s_raw and openshift_raw modules have been aliased to the new k8s module.
trans-unit.target: 该 k8s_raw 和 openshift_raw 模块已化名为新 k8s 模块。

trans-unit.source: The k8s_scale module now supports scalable OpenShift objects, such as DeploymentConfig.
trans-unit.target: 该 k8s_scale 模块现在支持可扩展的OpenShift对象，如 DeploymentConfig 。

trans-unit.source: The key=value syntax for passing variables to import and include is deprecated. Use YAML vars: instead.
trans-unit.target: 不建议使用用于传递变量以导入和包含的 key=value 语法。使用YAML vars: 代替。

trans-unit.source: The known_hosts module lets you add or remove a host keys from the known_hosts file.
trans-unit.target: 该 known_hosts 的模块，您可以从添加或删除主机密钥 known_hosts 文件。

trans-unit.source: The leafs value is usually something like '101' or '101-102' depending on connection_type.
trans-unit.target: 根据 connection_type ， leafs 值通常为'101'或'101-102'之类的值。

trans-unit.source: The level argument configures the level of the user when logged into the system. This argument accepts string values admin or operator.
trans-unit.target: 该 level 时，登录到系统参数配置用户的水平。此参数接受字符串值admin或operator。

trans-unit.source: The lineinfile module was changed to show a warning when using an empty string as a regexp. Since an empty regexp matches every line in a file, it will replace the last line in a file rather than inserting. If this is the desired behavior, use '^' which will match every line and will not trigger the warning.
trans-unit.target: 使用空字符串作为正则表达式时， lineinfile 模块已更改为显示警告。由于空的正则表达式匹配文件中的每一行，因此它将替换文件中的最后一行，而不是插入。如果这是理想的行为，请使用 '^' ，它将匹配每行并且不会触发警告。

trans-unit.source: The lldp_tlvmap is a numeric value that is a sum of all TLV values of selected attributes.
trans-unit.target: 所述 lldp_tlvmap 是一个数字值，该值是所选属性的所有TLV值的总和。

trans-unit.source: The local_http argument controls the operating state of the local HTTP transport protocol when eAPI is present in the running-config. When the value is set to True, the HTTP protocol is enabled and restricted to connections from localhost only. When the value is set to False, the HTTP local protocol is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 当running-config中存在eAPI时， local_http 参数控制本地HTTP传输协议的操作状态。将该值设置为True时，将启用HTTP协议并将其限制为仅来自本地主机的连接。将该值设置为False时，将禁用HTTP本地协议。

trans-unit.source: The login command requires using your GitHub credentials. You can use your username and password, or you can create a personal access token. If you choose to create a token, grant minimal access to the token, as it is used just to verify identify.
trans-unit.target: 该 login 命令需要使用GitHub的凭据。您可以使用用户名和密码，也可以创建个人访问令牌。如果您选择创建令牌，请授予对令牌的最小访问权限，因为它仅用于验证身份。

trans-unit.source: The logon_flags key specifies how Windows will log the user on when creating the new process. The value can be set to none or multiple of the following:
trans-unit.target: 该 logon_flags 键指定的Windows将如何记录生成新的进程，当用户。该值可以设置为以下任何一个或多个：

trans-unit.source: The lookup_source argument provides one or more source interfaces to use for performing DNS lookups. The interface provided in lookup_source must be a valid interface configured on the device.
trans-unit.target: 所述 lookup_source 参数提供一个或多个源接口，以使用用于执行DNS查找。 lookup_source 中提供的接口必须是设备上配置的有效接口。

trans-unit.source: The loop keyword is equivalent to with_list, and is the best choice for simple loops.
trans-unit.target: 该 loop 关键字相当于 with_list ，是简单的循环最好的选择。

trans-unit.source: The loop keyword requires a list as input, but the lookup keyword returns a string of comma-separated values by default. Ansible 2.5 introduced a new Jinja2 function named Invoking lookup plugins with query that always returns a list, offering a simpler interface and more predictable output from lookup plugins when using the loop keyword.
trans-unit.target: 所述 loop 关键字要求的列表作为输入，但 lookup 关键字默认返回逗号分隔的值的字符串。Ansible 2.5引入了一个新的Jinja2函数，名为带有查询的调用查找插件，该函数始终返回一个列表，使用 loop 关键字时，提供了一个更简单的界面以及查找插件的更可预测的输出。

trans-unit.source: The loop keyword requires a list as input, but the lookup keyword returns a string of comma-separated values by default. Ansible 2.5 introduced a new Jinja2 function named query that always returns a list, offering a simpler interface and more predictable output from lookup plugins when using the loop keyword.
trans-unit.target: 所述 loop 关键字要求的列表作为输入，但 lookup 关键字默认返回逗号分隔的值的字符串。Ansible 2.5引入了一个名为query的新Jinja2函数，该函数始终返回一个列表，使用 loop 关键字时，它提供了更简单的界面以及来自查找插件的更可预测的输出。

trans-unit.source: The loop keyword will not accept a string as input, see Ensuring list input for loop: query vs. lookup.
trans-unit.target: 该 loop 关键字不会接受一个字符串作为输入，见确保列表输入回路：查询与查找。

trans-unit.source: The loop keyword will not accept a string as input, see Ensuring list input for loop: using query rather than lookup.
trans-unit.target: 该 loop 关键字不会接受一个字符串作为输入，见确保列表输入回路：使用查询，而不是查找。

trans-unit.source: The loop_control keyword lets you manage your loops in useful ways.
trans-unit.target: 该 loop_control 关键字可以以有效的方式管理自己的循环。

trans-unit.source: The ltm module must always be specified when performing discovery or re-discovery of the the device.
trans-unit.target: 所述 ltm 执行发现或该装置的重新发现当模块必须总是被指定。

trans-unit.source: The lw4o6-table datastore does not keep checksums of its file. Therefore, you would need to provide this argument to update any of these files.
trans-unit.target: 该 lw4o6-table 数据存储不保留其文件的校验和。因此，您需要提供此参数来更新任何这些文件。

trans-unit.source: The main.yaml file should just reference the transport.
trans-unit.target: 该 main.yaml 文件应该只是参考的运输。

trans-unit.source: The match argument controls the method used to match against the current active configuration. By default, the desired config is matched against the active config and the deltas are loaded. If the match argument is set to none the active configuration is ignored and the configuration is always loaded.
trans-unit.target: 所述 match 参数控制用于匹配的当前激活的配置的方法。默认情况下，所需配置与活动配置匹配，并且增量已加载。如果 match 参数设置为 none ，则忽略活动配置，并且始终加载该配置。

trans-unit.source: The max_fail_percentage setting applies to each batch when you use it with serial. In the example above, if more than 3 of the 10 servers in the first (or any) batch of servers failed, the rest of the play would be aborted.
trans-unit.target: 当与serial一起使用时， max_fail_percentage 设置适用于每个批次。在上面的示例中，如果第一批（或任何一批）服务器中的10台服务器中有3台以上发生故障，则其余的播放将被中止。

trans-unit.source: The memset_memstore_facts module was renamed to memset_memstore_info.
trans-unit.target: 该 memset_memstore_facts 模块更名为memset_memstore_info。

trans-unit.source: The memset_server_facts module was renamed to memset_server_info.
trans-unit.target: 该 memset_server_facts 模块更名为memset_server_info。

trans-unit.source: The meta: flush_handlers task triggers any handlers that have been notified at that point in the play.
trans-unit.target: 在 meta: flush_handlers 任务触发已经在这出戏该点被通知的任何处理。

trans-unit.source: The modprobe module now detects kernel builtins. Previously, attempting to remove (with state: absent) a builtin kernel module succeeded without any error message because modprobe did not detect the module as present. Now, modprobe will fail if a kernel module is builtin and state: absent (with an error message from the modprobe binary like modprobe: ERROR: Module nfs is builtin.), and it will succeed without reporting changed if state: present. Any playbooks that are using changed_when: no to mask this quirk can safely remove that workaround. To get the previous behavior when applying state: absent to a builtin kernel module, use failed_when: false or ignore_errors: true in your playbook.
trans-unit.target: 现在， modprobe 模块可以检测内核内置函数。此前，试图删除（与 state: absent ）一个内置的内核模块成功，未出现任何错误消息，因为 modprobe 的未检测模块 present 。现在，如果内置了内核模块并 state: absent modprobe 将失败（缺少来自modprobe二进制文件的错误消息，例如 modprobe: ERROR: Module nfs is builtin. ），并且如果 state: present ，则它会成功而不报告更改。任何使用 changed_when: no 掩盖此怪癖的剧本都可以安全地删除该解决方法。申请时获得以前的行为 state: absent 一个内置的内核模块，使用 failed_when: false 或 ignore_errors: true 在你的剧本。

trans-unit.source: The module_defaults attribute can be used at the play, block, and task level. Any module arguments explicitly specified in a task will override any established default for that module argument:
trans-unit.target: 该 module_defaults 属性可以在玩，块和任务级别使用。在任务中显式指定的任何模块参数都将覆盖该模块参数的任何已建立的默认值：

trans-unit.source: The monitor_type field related to the bigip_node module, for this nodes monitors.
trans-unit.target: 与 bigip_node 模块相关的 monitor_type 字段，用于此节点监视。

trans-unit.source: The msi provider scans for MSI packages installed on a machine wide and current user context based on the ProductCode of the MSI.
trans-unit.target: 在 msi 基础上，已安装的一台机器宽，当前用户上下文的MSI软件包提供扫描 ProductCode 微星的。

trans-unit.source: The msi was added in Ansible 2.6.
trans-unit.target: 在 msi 在Ansible 2.6增加。

trans-unit.source: The msix provider is used to install .appx, .msix, .appxbundle, or .msixbundle packages. These packages are only installed or removed on the current use. The host must be set to allow sideloaded apps or in developer mode. See the examples for how to enable this. If a package is already installed but path points to an updated package, this will be installed over the top of the existing one.
trans-unit.target: 该 msix 提供用于安装 .appx ， .msix ， .appxbundle ，或 .msixbundle 包。这些软件包仅在当前使用时安装或删除。必须将主机设置为允许侧面加载的应用程序或处于开发人员模式。请参阅示例以了解如何启用此功能。如果已经安装了一个软件包，但 path 指向更新的软件包，则它将安装在现有软件包的顶部。

trans-unit.source: The msp provider scans for all MSP patches installed on a machine wide and current user context based on the PatchCode of the MSP. A msp will be applied or removed on all msi products that it applies to and is installed. If the patch is obsoleted or superseded then no action will be taken.
trans-unit.target: 在 msp 基础上，已安装的一台机器宽，当前用户上下文上的所有补丁MSP提供扫描 PatchCode 的MSP的。一个 msp 将在所有应用或删除 msi 的产品，它适用于和安装。如果补丁已过时或被取代，则不会采取任何措施。

trans-unit.source: The mstp, rstp and stp options are only supported on hardware platforms. Attempting to set these modes on VE type platforms will result in failure. The only valid options on VE type platforms are: passthru and disabled.
trans-unit.target: 在 mstp ， rstp 和 stp 选项仅支持的硬件平台。尝试在VE型平台上设置这些模式将导致失败。VE类型平台上唯一有效的选项是： passthru 和 disabled 。

trans-unit.source: The na_ontap_cluster_peer module has replaced source_intercluster_lif and dest_intercluster_lif string options with source_intercluster_lifs and dest_intercluster_lifs list options
trans-unit.target: 该 na_ontap_cluster_peer 模块已经取代 source_intercluster_lif 和 dest_intercluster_lif 用绳子选项 source_intercluster_lifs 和 dest_intercluster_lifs 列表选项

trans-unit.source: The nagios module has two basic functions: scheduling downtime and toggling alerts for services or hosts.
trans-unit.target: 在 nagios 模块有两个基本职能：计划停机时间和触发警报服务或主机。

trans-unit.source: The name argument defines the username of the user to be created on the system. This argument must follow appropriate usernaming conventions for the target device running JUNOS. This argument is mutually exclusive with the aggregate argument.
trans-unit.target: 该 name 参数定义了用户的用户名在系统上创建。对于运行JUNOS的目标设备，此参数必须遵循适当的用户命名约定。此参数与 aggregate 参数互斥。

trans-unit.source: The name key is a template used to generate hostnames based on the layers option. Each variable in the name is expanded to create a cartesian product of all possible layer combinations.
trans-unit.target: 该 name 键是用来生成基于主机名的模板 layers 的选择。名称中的每个变量都会展开，以创建所有可能的图层组合的笛卡尔积。

trans-unit.source: The name key specifies a name for the device. The device name must be unique per server. This key is required.
trans-unit.target: 该 name 键指定设备的名称。每个服务器的设备名称必须唯一。此密钥是必需的。

trans-unit.source: The name module option for win_package has been removed; this is not used anywhere and should just be removed from your playbooks.
trans-unit.target: win_package 的 name 模块选项已删除；不会在任何地方使用它，而应将其从您的剧本中删除。

trans-unit.source: The name suboption provides the fully qualified collection name (FQCN) of the parsing engine (ansible.netcommon.native).
trans-unit.target: 该 name 子选项提供了解析引擎（的完全限定集合名称（FQCN） ansible.netcommon.native ）。

trans-unit.source: The name_serves argument accepts a list of DNS name servers by way of either FQDN or IP address to use to perform name resolution lookups. This argument accepts wither a list of DNS servers See examples.
trans-unit.target: 该 name_serves 参数通过两种FQDN或IP地址的方式接受DNS域名服务器的列表，用来执行名称解析查找。此参数接受DNS服务器列表的枯萎（请参阅示例）。

trans-unit.source: The napt mode provides standard address and port translation allowing multiple clients in a private network to access remote networks using the single IP address assigned to their router.
trans-unit.target: 该 napt 模式提供标准地址和端口转换，允许私有网络访问远程网络的多个客户端使用分配给他们的路由器的单个IP地址。

trans-unit.source: The nd_ra option is used to treat the gateway_ip address as a Neighbor Discovery Router Advertisement Prefix.
trans-unit.target: 该 nd_ra 选项用于治疗gateway_ip地址作为邻居发现路由器通告前缀。

trans-unit.source: The netconf connection plugin uses the ncclient Python library under the hood to initiate a NETCONF session with a NETCONF-enabled remote network device. ncclient also executes NETCONF RPC requests and receives responses. You must install the ncclient on the local Ansible controller.
trans-unit.target: 所述 netconf 连接插件使用 ncclient 引擎盖下Python库发起与NETCONF启用远程网络设备一个NETCONF会话。 ncclient 还执行NETCONF RPC请求并接收响应。您必须安装 ncclient 当地Ansible控制器上。

trans-unit.source: The ownca provider is intended for generating OpenSSL certificate signed with your own CA (Certificate Authority) certificate (self-signed certificate).
trans-unit.target: 该 ownca 提供适用于用自己的CA（证书颁发机构）证书（自签名证书）签署生成的OpenSSL证书。

trans-unit.source: The ownca provider is intended for generating an OpenSSL certificate signed with your own CA (Certificate Authority) certificate (self-signed certificate).

The packet_device module has a wait_for_public_IPv that is used to specify the version of the IP address to wait for (valid values are 4 or 6 for IPv4 or IPv6). If specified, Ansible will wait until the GET API call for a device contains an Internet-routeable IP address of the specified version. When referring to an IP address of a created device in subsequent module calls, it’s wise to use the wait_for_public_IPv parameter, or state: active in the packet_device module call.
trans-unit.target: 所述 packet_device 模块具有 wait_for_public_IPv 是，用于指定IP地址的版本，以等待（有效值是 4 或 6 为IPv4或IPv6）。如果指定，Ansible将等到设备的GET API调用包含指定版本的Internet路由IP地址。在后续的模块调用中引用创建的设备的IP地址时，明智的方法是使用packet_device模块调用中的 wait_for_public_IPv 参数或 state: active 。

trans-unit.source: The pam_limits module modifies PAM limits. The default file is /etc/security/limits.conf. For the full documentation, see man 5 limits.conf.
trans-unit.target: 所述 pam_limits 模块修改PAM限制。缺省文件是 /etc/security/limits.conf 。有关完整文档，请参见 man 5 limits.conf 。

trans-unit.source: The panos modules have been deprecated in favor of using the Palo Alto Networks Ansible Galaxy role. Contributions to the role can be made here.
trans-unit.target: 该 panos 模块已弃用，取而代之的使用帕洛阿尔托网络Ansible银河作用。可以在这里为角色做出贡献。

trans-unit.source: The params option was removed in Ansible 2.5 due to circumventing Ansible’s option handling
trans-unit.target: 该 params 选项在Ansible 2.5删除，由于规避Ansible的选项处理

trans-unit.source: The params parameter was removed in Ansible 2.5 due to circumventing Ansible’s parameter handling
trans-unit.target: 该 params 由于规避Ansible的参数处理参数在Ansible 2.5移除

trans-unit.source: The parent_id takes president over parent when supplied
trans-unit.target: 该 parent_id 需要在总统 parent 提供的时

trans-unit.source: The parents are a list of parent groups that the host belongs to. Each parent item contains a name key, again expanded from the template, and an optional parents key that lists its parents.
trans-unit.target: 的 parents 是主机归属于母公司组的列表。每个 parent 项都包含一个 name 键（再次从模板扩展），以及一个可选的 parents 键，列出了其父项。

trans-unit.source: The parse_cli filter will load the spec file and pass the command output through it, returning JSON output. The YAML spec file defines how to parse the CLI output.
trans-unit.target: 该 parse_cli 滤波器将加载spec文件，并通过它传递的命令输出，返回JSON输出。YAML规范文件定义了如何解析CLI输出。

trans-unit.source: The parse_xml filter will load the spec file and pass the command output through formatted as JSON.
trans-unit.target: 该 parse_xml 滤波器将加载spec文件并传递命令输出通过JSON格式。

trans-unit.source: The parser option provides information specific to the parser engine.
trans-unit.target: 该 parser 选项提供特定信息分析器引擎。

trans-unit.source: The partition_access parameter controls which partitions the account can access.
trans-unit.target: 该 partition_access 参数控制一个分隔帐户可以访问。

trans-unit.source: The pba mode logs the allocation and release of port blocks for subscriber translation requests, instead of separately logging each translation request.
trans-unit.target: 该 pba 模式记录的分配和端口块订户翻译请求的释放，而不是分别记录每个翻译请求。

trans-unit.source: The pba_block_size value should be less than or equal to the LSN pool range, i.e the range of ports defined by port_range_low and port_range_high values.
trans-unit.target: 所述 pba_block_size 值应小于或等于LSN池范围，即由下式定义的端口范围 port_range_low 和 port_range_high 值。

trans-unit.source: The pip module has added a dependency on setuptools to support version requirements, this requirement is for the Python interpreter that executes the module and not the Python interpreter that the module is managing.
trans-unit.target: 该 pip 模块添加的依赖关系 setuptools 的，以支持版本的要求，这种要求是Python解释器执行的模块，而不是Python解释器的模块管理。

trans-unit.source: The pn_command takes a CLI show command as value.
trans-unit.target: 所述 pn_command 需要CLI显示命令值。

trans-unit.source: The pn_name takes a valid name for vlag configuration.
trans-unit.target: 该 pn_name 花费VLAG配置的有效名称。

trans-unit.source: The pool must exist in order to add or delete a encap block.
trans-unit.target: 该 pool 必须存在才能添加或删除encap块。

trans-unit.source: The pool must exist in order to add or delete a range.
trans-unit.target: 该 pool 必须存在才能添加或删除范围。

trans-unit.source: The port part is overwritten by port option, if defined.
trans-unit.target: 如果定义了 port 部分，则该端口部分将被端口选项覆盖。

trans-unit.source: The port variable is reserved as a play/task directive for overriding the connection port, in previous versions this got conflated with a variable named port and was usable later in the play, this created issues if a host tried to reconnect or was using a non caching connection. Now it will be correctly identified as a directive and the port variable will appear as undefined, this now forces the use of non conflicting names and removes ambiguity when adding settings and variables to a role invocation.
trans-unit.target: 该 port 变量被保留为重载连接端口播放/任务指令，在以前的版本中这引起了混为一谈具有可变命名 port 和后来在剧中使用，这产生问题，如果试图重新连接或主机是使用非缓存连接。现在，它将被正确识别为指令，并且 port 变量将显示为未定义，这现在将强制使用无冲突的名称，并且在向角色调用添加设置和变量时消除了歧义。

trans-unit.source: The port_range_high must always be higher or equal to port_range_high value.
trans-unit.target: 该 port_range_high 必须始终高于或等于 port_range_high 值。

trans-unit.source: The port_range_low must always be lower or equal to port_range_high value.
trans-unit.target: 该 port_range_low 必须始终低于或等于 port_range_high 值。

trans-unit.source: The powershell shell plugin now uses async_dir to define the async path for the results file and the default has changed to %USERPROFILE%\.ansible_async. To control this path now, either set the ansible_async_dir variable or the async_dir value in the powershell section of the config ini.
trans-unit.target: 在 powershell 外壳，现在插件使用 async_dir 定义结果文件异步路径，默认已更改为 %USERPROFILE%\.ansible_async 。要立即控制此路径，请在config ini 的 powershell 部分中设置 ansible_async_dir 变量或 async_dir 值。

trans-unit.source: The pre_tasks keyword just lets you list tasks to run before the roles are called. This will make more sense in a minute. If you look at the names of these tasks, you can see that we are disabling Nagios alerts and then removing the webserver that we are currently updating from the HAProxy load balancing pool.
trans-unit.target: 该 pre_tasks 关键字只是让你列出运行被称为角色之前的任务。一分钟后，这将变得更有意义。如果查看这些任务的名称，则可以看到我们正在禁用Nagios警报，然后从HAProxy负载平衡池中删除了当前正在更新的Web服务器。

trans-unit.source: The private option only allows communication with hosts in the same VRF.
trans-unit.target: 在 private 选项只允许在同一个VRF主机进行通信。

trans-unit.source: The privilege argument configures the privilege level of the user when logged into the system. This argument accepts integer values in the range of 1 to 15.
trans-unit.target: 该 privilege 时登录到系统参数配置用户的权限级别。该参数接受范围为1到15的整数。

trans-unit.source: The procedure is supported since collection version 1.3.0 and PostgreSQL 11.
The properties return value will contain an empty string key "" that refers to the key’s Default value. If the value has not been set then this key is not returned.
trans-unit.target: 该 properties 返回值将包含一个空字符串键值 "" 是指键的 Default 值。如果尚未设置该值，则不返回此键。

trans-unit.source: The public option allows the Subnet to be advertised outside of the ACI Fabric, and allows communication with hosts in other VRFs.
trans-unit.target: 该 public 选项允许子网是ACI面料的通告之外，并允许与其他VRF的主机进行通信。

trans-unit.source: The purge argument instructs the module to consider the resource definition absolute. It will remove any previously configured usernames on the device with the exception of the `admin` user which cannot be deleted per cnos constraints.
trans-unit.target: 该 purge 参数指示模块绝对考虑资源定义。它将删除设备上任何先前配置的用户名，但“ admin”用户除外，该用户名不能根据cnos约束删除。

trans-unit.source: The purge argument instructs the module to consider the resource definition absolute. It will remove any previously configured usernames on the device with the exception of the `admin` user which cannot be deleted per nxos constraints.
trans-unit.target: 该 purge 参数指示模块绝对考虑资源定义。它将删除设备上任何先前配置的用户名，但“ admin”用户除外，该用户名不能根据nxos约束删除。

trans-unit.source: The purge argument instructs the module to consider the users definition absolute. It will remove any previously configured users on the device with the exception of the current defined set of aggregate.
trans-unit.target: 该 purge 参数指示模块绝对考虑用户定义。它将删除设备上所有先前配置的用户，但当前定义的集合除外。

trans-unit.source: The python_requirements_facts module was renamed to python_requirements_info.
trans-unit.target: 该 python_requirements_facts 模块更名为python_requirements_info。

trans-unit.source: The qdcount vector does not support fully-automatic or stress-based-mitigation for this parameter.
trans-unit.target: 所述 qdcount 矢量不支持 fully-automatic 或 stress-based-mitigation 此参数。

trans-unit.source: The qdcount vector does not support fully-automatic, or stress-based-mitigation for this parameter.
trans-unit.target: 所述 qdcount 矢量不支持 fully-automatic ，或 stress-based-mitigation 此参数。

trans-unit.source: The querier_ip option is used to treat the gateway_ip as an IGMP querier source IP.
trans-unit.target: 该 querier_ip 选项用于治疗gateway_ip作为IGMP查询源IP。

trans-unit.source: The query state gets the current ACL without changing it, for use in register operations.
trans-unit.target: 该 query 状态获取当前ACL而不改变它，在使用 register 操作。

trans-unit.source: The random filter in Ansible is an extension of the default Jinja2 random filter, and can be used to return a random item from a sequence of items or to generate a random number based on a range.
trans-unit.target: Ansible中的 random 过滤器是默认Jinja2随机过滤器的扩展，可用于从一系列项目中返回一个随机项目或根据范围生成随机数。

trans-unit.source: The raw module simply executes a Powershell command remotely. Since raw has none of the wrappers that Ansible typically uses, become, async and environment variables do not work.
trans-unit.target: 的 raw 模块简单地远程执行powershell命令。由于 raw 没有Ansible通常使用的包装器，因此 become ， async 和环境变量不起作用。

trans-unit.target: 该 redfish_facts 模块更名为redfish_info。使用新名称调用时，模块不再返回 ansible_facts 。要访问返回值，请注册一个变量。

trans-unit.source: The redshift_facts module was renamed to redshift_info.
trans-unit.target: 该 redshift_facts 模块更名为redshift_info。

trans-unit.source: The registry provider is used for traditional exe installers and uses the following registry path to determine if a product was installed; HKLM:\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Uninstall, HKLM:\Software\Wow6432Node\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Uninstall, HKCU:\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Uninstall, and HKCU:\Software\Wow6432Node\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Uninstall.
trans-unit.target: 该 registry 提供用于传统 exe 安装并使用以下注册表路径，以确定是否安装了产品; HKLM:\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Uninstall ， HKLM:\Software\Wow6432Node\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Uninstall ， HKCU:\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Uninstall 和 HKCU:\Software\Wow6432Node\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Uninstall 。

trans-unit.source: The remote_src argument enables the download of files (scp get) from the remote device. The default behavior is to upload files (scp put) to the remote device.
trans-unit.target: 该 remote_src 参数使文件（的下载SCP GET）从远程设备。默认行为是将文件（scp put）上传到远程设备。

trans-unit.source: The remote_user parameter was formerly called just user. It was renamed in Ansible 1.4 to make it more distinguishable from the user module (used to create users on remote systems).
trans-unit.target: 该 remote_user 参数以前被称为只是 user 。在Ansible 1.4中将其重命名，以使其与用户模块（用于在远程系统上创建用户）更加区分开。

trans-unit.source: The remove attribute is required only when removing properties.
trans-unit.target: 该 remove 去除属性时属性时，才需要。

trans-unit.source: The replace argument will instruct the remote device to replace the current configuration hierarchy with the one specified in the corresponding hierarchy of the source configuration loaded from this module.
trans-unit.target: 所述 replace 参数将指示远程设备与从该模块加载的源配置的对应的层次结构中指定的一个来替换当前配置的层次结构。

trans-unit.source: The repository_source_location must match the current source location of a registered repository to get a repository name.
trans-unit.target: 该 repository_source_location 必须注册仓库的电流源的位置匹配得到一个存储库名称。

trans-unit.source: The requests-credssp wrapper can be installed using pip:
trans-unit.target: 该 requests-credssp 包装可以使用安装 pip ：

trans-unit.source: The require-strict setting the system requires strict renegotiation of SSL connections. In this mode the system refuses connections to insecure servers, and terminates existing SSL connections to insecure servers.
trans-unit.target: 系统的 require-strict 设置要求严格重新协商SSL连接。在这种模式下，系统拒绝与不安全服务器的连接，并终止与不安全服务器的现有SSL连接。

trans-unit.source: The rocketchat module sends notifications to Rocket Chat via the Incoming WebHook integration
trans-unit.target: 该 rocketchat 模块通过传入网络挂接集成发送通知到火箭聊天

trans-unit.source: The role argument configures the role for the username in the device running configuration. The argument accepts a string value defining the role name. This argument does not check if the role has been configured on the device.
trans-unit.target: 该 role 的参数配置在设备运行配置的用户名中的作用。该参数接受定义角色名称的字符串值。此参数不检查角色是否已在设备上配置。

trans-unit.source: The role argument defines the role of the user account on the remote system. User accounts can have more than one role configured.
trans-unit.target: 该 role 参数定义的用户帐户的远程系统上的作用。用户帐户可以配置多个角色。

trans-unit.source: The role_id has precedence over the role when supplied.
trans-unit.target: 提供时， role_id 优先于 role 。

trans-unit.source: The rollback argument instructs the module to rollback the current configuration to the identifier specified in the argument. If the specified rollback identifier does not exist on the remote device, the module will fail. To rollback to the most recent commit, set the rollback argument to 0.
trans-unit.target: 该 rollback 参数指示模块将当前配置回滚到在参数指定的标识符。如果远程设备上不存在指定的回滚标识符，则该模块将失败。要回滚到最近的提交，请将 rollback 参数设置为0。

trans-unit.source: The rollback argument instructs the module to rollback the current configuration to the identifier specified in the argument. If the specified rollback identifier does not exist on the remote device, the module will fail. To rollback to the most recent commit, set the rollback argument to 0. This option is mutually exclusive with config.
trans-unit.target: 该 rollback 参数指示模块将当前配置回滚到在参数指定的标识符。如果远程设备上不存在指定的回滚标识符，则该模块将失败。要回滚到最近的提交，请将 rollback 参数设置为0。此选项与 config 互斥。

trans-unit.source: The root user may not be removed.
trans-unit.target: 的 root 用户可以不被去除。

trans-unit.source: The route53_facts module was renamed to route53_info.
trans-unit.target: 该 route53_facts 模块更名为route53_info。

trans-unit.source: The route_target_both property is discouraged due to the inconsistent behavior of the property across Nexus platforms and image versions. For this reason it is recommended to use explicit route_target_export and route_target_import properties instead of route_target_both.
trans-unit.target: 不推荐使用 route_target_both 属性，因为该属性在Nexus平台和映像版本之间的行为不一致。因此，建议使用显式的 route_target_export 和 route_target_import 属性，而不要使用 route_target_both 。

trans-unit.source: The rpc argument specifies the RPC call to send to the remote devices to be executed. The RPC Reply message is parsed and the contents are returned to the playbook.
trans-unit.target: 该 rpc 要执行参数指定RPC调用发送到远程设备。分析RPC Reply消息，并将内容返回给剧本。

trans-unit.source: The rpcs argument accepts a list of RPCs to be executed over a netconf session and the results from the RPC execution is return to the playbook via the modules results dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 所述 rpcs 参数接受在NETCONF会话将被执行的RPC的列表，并从RPC执行的结果是通过结果字典模块返回到剧本。

trans-unit.source: The sAMAccountType_AnsibleFlags and userAccountControl_AnsibleFlags return property is something set by the module itself as an easy way to view what those flags represent. These properties cannot be used as part of the filter or ldap_filter and are automatically added if those properties were requested.
trans-unit.target: 该 sAMAccountType_AnsibleFlags 和 userAccountControl_AnsibleFlags 由模块本身财产归还是一套东西作为一种简单的方式来查看什么这些标志代表。这些属性不能用作过滤器或ldap_filter的一部分，如果需要这些属性，则会自动添加这些属性。

trans-unit.source: The save argument controls whether or not changes made to the active configuration are saved to disk. This is independent of committing the config. When set to True, the active configuration is saved.
trans-unit.target: 在 save 参数控制是否更改到Active配置进行保存到磁盘。这与提交配置无关。设置为 True 时，将保存活动配置。

trans-unit.source: The save argument controls whether or not changes made to the active configuration are saved to disk. This is independent of committing the config. When set to True, the active configuration is saved.
trans-unit.target: 在 save 参数控制是否更改到Active配置进行保存到磁盘。这与提交配置无关。设置为True时，将保存活动配置。

trans-unit.source: The save argument instructs the module to save the configuration in target datastore to the startup-config if changed and if :startup capability is supported by Netconf server.
trans-unit.target: 在 save 参数指示模块的配置保存 target 是否改变，如果数据存储到启动配置：启动功能由服务器Netconf的支持。

trans-unit.source: The save argument instructs the module to save the current-configuration to saved-configuration. This operation is performed after any changes are made to the current running config. If no changes are made, the configuration is still saved to the startup config. This option will always cause the module to return changed.
trans-unit.target: 在 save 参数指示模块保存当前配置，以保存配置。对当前运行的配置进行任何更改后，将执行此操作。如果未进行任何更改，则配置仍将保存到启动配置中。此选项将始终使模块返回更改状态。

trans-unit.source: The save argument instructs the module to save the running- config to the startup-config at the conclusion of the module running. If check mode is specified, this argument is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 在 save 参数指示模块保存该磨合配置到启动配置在模块运行的结论。如果指定了检查模式，则忽略此参数。

trans-unit.source: The save argument instructs the module to save the running-config to startup-config.
trans-unit.target: 在 save 参数指示模块保存运行配置到启动配置。

trans-unit.source: The save argument instructs the module to save the running-config to startup-config. This operation is performed after any changes are made to the current running config. If no changes are made, the configuration is still saved to the startup config. This option will always cause the module to return changed. This argument is mutually exclusive with save_when.
trans-unit.target: 在 save 参数指示模块保存运行配置到启动配置。对当前运行的配置进行任何更改后，将执行此操作。如果未进行任何更改，则配置仍将保存到启动配置中。此选项将始终使模块返回更改状态。此参数与save_when互斥。

trans-unit.source: The script module executes a script from the Ansible controller on one or more Windows hosts. Like raw, script currently does not support become, async, or environment variables.
trans-unit.target: 该 script 模块执行从一个或多个Windows主机Ansible控制器的脚本。像 raw 一样， script 当前不支持 become ， async 或环境变量。

trans-unit.source: The script module takes the script name followed by a list of space-delimited arguments.
trans-unit.target: 该 script 模块执行脚本名称，后跟的空间分隔的参数列表。

trans-unit.source: The serial keyword can also be specified as a percentage, which will be applied to the total number of hosts in a play, in order to determine the number of hosts per pass:
trans-unit.target: 也可以将 serial 关键字指定为百分比，该百分比将应用于播放中的主机总数，以确定每次通过的主机数：

trans-unit.source: The serial keyword forces the play to be executed in ‘batches’. Each batch counts as a full play with a subselection of hosts. This has some consequences on play behavior. For example, if all hosts in a batch fails, the play fails, which in turn fails the entire run. You should consider this when combining with max_fail_percentage.
trans-unit.target: 该 serial 关键字力量发挥在“批”执行。每个批处理都算是主机选择的完整玩法。这会对游戏行为产生一些影响。例如，如果批处理中的所有主机均失败，则播放失败，从而使整个运行失败。与 max_fail_percentage 结合使用时，应考虑这一点。

trans-unit.source: The set_fact module takes key=value pairs as variables to set in the playbook scope. Or alternatively, accepts complex arguments using the args: statement.
trans-unit.target: 所述 set_fact 模块占用键=值对如在剧本范围变量集。或者，也可以使用 args: 语句接受复杂的参数。

trans-unit.source: The shared-rtctrl option controls which external prefixes are advertised to other tenants for shared services.
trans-unit.target: 该 shared-rtctrl 其外部前缀通告给其他租户共享服务选项控制。

trans-unit.source: The shared-security option configures the classifier for the subnets in the VRF where the routes are leaked.
trans-unit.target: 在 shared-security 选项配置为在路由泄漏在VRF子网分类。

trans-unit.source: The shared key in the parser template allows the interface name to be used in subsequent parser entries. The use of examples and free-spacing mode with the regular expressions makes the template easier to read.
trans-unit.target: 解析器模板中的 shared 密钥允许接口名称在后续的解析器条目中使用。在正则表达式中使用示例和自由行距模式可以使模板更易于阅读。

trans-unit.source: The shell module takes the command name followed by a list of space-delimited arguments.
trans-unit.target: 该 shell 模块执行命令名称后面的空格分隔的参数列表。

trans-unit.source: The short_os in the template filename is derived from either the host ansible_network_os or ansible_distribution.
trans-unit.target: 模板文件名中的 short_os 是从主机 ansible_network_os 或 ansible_distribution 派生的。

trans-unit.source: The show interface | json command is issued on the device.
trans-unit.target: 该 show interface | json 命令在设备上发出。

trans-unit.source: The show interface command output from the network device looks as follows:
trans-unit.target: 网络设备的 show interface 命令输出如下所示：

trans-unit.source: The show running command is the most resource-intensive command to execute on a network device, because of the way queries are handled by the network OS. Using the command in your Ansible playbook will slow performance significantly, especially on large devices; repeating it will multiply the performance hit. If you have a playbook that checks the running config, then executes changes, then checks the running config again, you should expect that playbook to be very slow.
trans-unit.target: 该 show running 命令是资源最密集的要执行的命令，因为查询是通过网络操作系统处理方式在网络设备上。在Ansible剧本中使用命令会大大降低性能，尤其是在大型设备上；重复此操作将使性能提高。如果您有一本可检查正在运行的配置，然后执行更改，然后再次检查正在运行的配置的剧本，则应该期望该剧本非常慢。

trans-unit.source: The shuffle filter randomizes an existing list, giving a different order every invocation.
trans-unit.target: 该 shuffle 过滤器随机化现有列表，给人以不同的顺序每次调用。

trans-unit.source: The sip-malformed vector does not support fully-automatic or stress-based-mitigation for this parameter.
trans-unit.target: 该 sip-malformed 矢量不支持 fully-automatic 或 stress-based-mitigation 此参数。

trans-unit.source: The sip-malformed vector does not support fully-automatic, or stress-based-mitigation for this parameter.
trans-unit.target: 该 sip-malformed 矢量不支持 fully-automatic ，或 stress-based-mitigation 此参数。

trans-unit.source: The slack module sends notifications to http://slack.com via the Incoming WebHook integration
trans-unit.target: 该 slack 模块发送通知http://slack.com通过传入网络挂接整合

trans-unit.source: The smartos_image_facts module was renamed to smartos_image_info. When called with the new name, the module no longer returns ansible_facts. To access return values, register a variable.
trans-unit.target: 该 smartos_image_facts 模块更名为smartos_image_info。使用新名称调用时，模块不再返回 ansible_facts 。要访问返回值，请注册一个变量。

trans-unit.source: The sns_topic module allows you to create, delete, and manage subscriptions for AWS SNS topics. As of 2.6, this module can be use to subscribe and unsubscribe to topics outside of your AWS account.
trans-unit.target: 该 sns_topic 模块允许你创建，删除和管理AWS SNS主题订阅。从2.6开始，此模块可用于订阅和退订AWS账户之外的主题。

trans-unit.source: The socket argument controls the operating state of the UNIX Domain Socket used to receive eAPI requests. When the value of this argument is set to True, the UDS will listen for eAPI requests. When the value is set to False, the UDS will not be available to handle requests. By default when eAPI is first configured, the UDS is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 该 socket 参数控制Unix域套接字的工作状态用于接收EAPI请求。当此参数的值设置为True时，UDS将侦听eAPI请求。当该值设置为False时，UDS将无法处理请求。默认情况下，首次配置eAPI时，会禁用UDS。

trans-unit.source: The socket_path does not exist or cannot be found and unable to connect to socket messages are new in Ansible 2.5. These messages indicate that the socket used to communicate with the remote network device is unavailable or does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 该 socket_path does not exist or cannot be found 和 unable to connect to socket 中Ansible 2.5的消息是新的。这些消息表明用于与远程网络设备通信的套接字不可用或不存在。

trans-unit.source: The splitext filter returns a string. The individual components can be accessed by using the first and last filters:
trans-unit.target: 该 splitext 过滤器返回一个字符串。可以使用第 first 和 last 过滤器来访问各个组件：

trans-unit.source: The src argument specifies the path to the source config file to load. The source config file can either be in bracket format or set format. The source file can include Jinja2 template variables.
trans-unit.target: 该 src 参数指定路径到源配置文件到负载。源配置文件可以采用括号格式或设置格式。源文件可以包含Jinja2模板变量。

trans-unit.source: The src argument takes a single path, or a list of paths to be transferred. The argument recursive must be true to transfer directories.
trans-unit.target: 该 src 参数采用一个单一的路径，或要传输的路径的列表。 recursive 参数必须为 true 才能传输目录。

trans-unit.source: The ssh connection plugin will force pseudo-tty allocation via -tt when scripts are executed. Pseudo-ttys do not have a stderr channel and all stderr is sent to stdout. If you depend on separated stdout and stderr result keys, please switch to a copy+command set of tasks instead of using script.
trans-unit.target: 执行脚本时， ssh 连接插件将通过 -tt 强制分配伪tty 。伪ttys没有stderr通道，所有stderr都发送到stdout。如果您依赖于分开的stdout和stderr结果键，请切换到任务的复制+命令集，而不要使用脚本。

trans-unit.source: The ssh_config argument is path to the SSH configuration file. This can be used to load SSH information from a configuration file. If this option is not given by default ~/.ssh/config is queried.
trans-unit.target: 该 ssh_config 中参数是路径SSH配置文件。这可用于从配置文件加载SSH信息。如果默认情况下未提供此选项，则查询〜/ .ssh / config。

trans-unit.source: The ssh_private_key_file argument is path to the SSH private key file. This can be used if you need to provide a private key rather than loading the key into the ssh-key-ring/environment
trans-unit.target: 该 ssh_private_key_file 参数是路径SSH私钥文件。如果您需要提供私钥而不是将密钥加载到ssh-key-ring / environment中，则可以使用此方法

trans-unit.source: The ssh_pub_key parameter contains your ssh public key as a string. Here is an example inside a playbook:
trans-unit.target: 该 ssh_pub_key 参数包含您的SSH公钥的字符串。这是剧本中的一个示例：

trans-unit.source: The sshkey argument defines the SSH public key to configure for the username. This argument accepts a valid SSH key value.
trans-unit.target: 该 sshkey 参数定义用户名的SSH公钥进行配置。此参数接受有效的SSH密钥值。

trans-unit.source: The sshkey argument defines the public SSH key to be configured for the user account on the remote system. This argument must be a valid SSH key
trans-unit.target: 所述 sshkey 参数定义被配置用于在远程系统上的用户帐户的SSH密钥。此参数必须是有效的SSH密钥

trans-unit.source: The stat module is required for Ansible to run. So, please make sure you do not add this module in a blacklist modules list.
trans-unit.target: 该 stat 模块需要Ansible来运行。因此，请确保您未将此模块添加到黑名单模块列表中。

trans-unit.source: The state argument configures the state of the user definitions as it relates to the device operational configuration. When set to present, the user should be configured in the device active configuration and when set to absent the user should not be in the device active configuration
trans-unit.target: 的 state 参数配置用户定义的状态，因为它涉及到设备操作配置。设置为present时，应该在设备活动配置中配置用户，而如果设置为不存在，则用户不应该在设备活动配置中。

trans-unit.source: The state argument configures the state of the username definition as it relates to the device operational configuration. When set to present, the username(s) should be configured in the device active configuration and when set to absent the username(s) should not be in the device active configuration
trans-unit.target: 的 state 参数配置的用户名定义的状态，因为它涉及到设备操作配置。当设置为存在，用户名（多个）应在设备活动配置配置，且当设置为不存在的用户名（多个）不应当在设备活动配置

trans-unit.source: The state argument controls the operational state of eAPI on the remote device. When this argument is set to started, eAPI is enabled to receive requests and when this argument is stopped, eAPI is disabled and will not receive requests.
trans-unit.target: 的 state 参数控制EAPI的远程设备上的操作状态。当这个参数设置为 started ，EAPI能够接收请求，并在该参数 stopped ，EAPI被禁用，将不会收到请求。

trans-unit.source: The state argument controls whether or not the NXAPI feature is configured on the remote device. When the value is present the NXAPI feature configuration is present in the device running-config. When the values is absent the feature configuration is removed from the running-config.
trans-unit.target: 的 state 参数控制是否将NXAPI特征在远程设备上配置。如果 present 该值，则设备running-config中将存在 NXAPI功能配置。 absent 值时，功能配置将从运行配置中删除。

trans-unit.source: The state for a new resource module should support the following values (as applicable for the devices that support them):
trans-unit.target: 新资源模块的 state 应支持以下值（适用于支持它们的设备）：

trans-unit.source: The state=dump is deprecated and will be removed in 2.14. The community.zabbix.zabbix_template_info module should be used instead.
trans-unit.target: 的 state=dump 被使用，将在2.14被除去。应该改用community.zabbix.zabbix_template_info模块。

trans-unit.source: The status module option for win_nssm has changed its default value to present. Before, the default was start. Consequently, the service is no longer started by default after creation with win_nssm, and you should use the win_service module to start it if needed.
trans-unit.target: win_nssm 的 status 模块选项已将其默认值更改为 present 。之前，默认值为 start 。因此，使用 win_nssm 创建服务后，默认情况下将不再启动该服务，并且如果需要，您应该使用 win_service 模块来启动它。

trans-unit.source: The strategy plugin tells Ansible how to order multiple tasks on multiple hosts. Strategy is set at the playbook level.
trans-unit.target: 该 strategy 插件告诉Ansible如何订购多台主机上的多个任务。策略是在剧本级别设置的。

trans-unit.source: The string filter is only required for Python 2 and ensures that text to encode is a unicode string. Without that filter before b64encode the wrong value will be encoded.
trans-unit.target: 该 string 滤光器仅需要Python 2和确保文字编码是Unicode字符串。如果在b64encode之前没有该过滤器，则将对错误的值进行编码。

trans-unit.source: The subelements filter produces a product of an object and the subelement values of that object, similar to the subelements lookup. This lets you specify individual subelements to use in a template. For example, this expression:
trans-unit.target: 的 subelements 滤波器产生的对象和该对象，类似于的子元素值的乘积 subelements 查找。这使您可以指定要在模板中使用的各个子元素。例如，此表达式：

trans-unit.source: The sweep vector does not support this parameter.
trans-unit.target: 该 sweep 矢量不支持此参数。

trans-unit.source: The synchronize module forces –delay-updates to avoid leaving a destination in a broken in-between state if the underlying rsync process encounters an error. Those synchronizing large numbers of files that are willing to trade safety for performance should call rsync directly.
trans-unit.target: 如果基础rsync进程遇到错误，则 synchronize 模块将强制执行 –delay-updates 以避免使目标处于中间中断状态。那些愿意为性能而进行安全性交易的大量文件同步应该直接调用rsync。

trans-unit.source: The syslog and rfc5424 choices are the same.
trans-unit.target: 该 syslog 和 rfc5424 的选择是一样的。

trans-unit.source: The tempfile module creates temporary files and directories. mktemp command takes different parameters on various systems, this module helps to avoid troubles related to that. Files/directories created by module are accessible only by creator. In case you need to make them world-accessible you need to use ansible.builtin.file module.
trans-unit.target: 该 tempfile 模块创建临时文件和目录。 mktemp 命令在各种系统上采用不同的参数，此模块有助于避免与此相关的麻烦。由模块创建的文件/目录只能由创建者访问。如果需要使它们可全球访问，则需要使用ansible.builtin.file模块。

trans-unit.source: The throttle keyword limits the number of workers for a particular task. It can be set at the block and task level. Use throttle to restrict tasks that may be CPU-intensive or interact with a rate-limiting API:

trans-unit.source: The to_yaml and to_nice_yaml filters use the PyYAML library which has a default 80 symbol string length limit. That causes unexpected line break after 80th symbol (if there is a space after 80th symbol) To avoid such behavior and generate long lines, use the width option. You must use a hardcoded number to define the width, instead of a construction like float("inf"), because the filter does not support proxying Python functions. For example:
trans-unit.target: 的 to_yaml 和 to_nice_yaml 滤波器使用PyYAML库具有默认80符号串长度的限制。这会导致第80个符号后出现意外的换行（如果第80个符号后有空格），为避免这种情况并生成长行，请使用 width 选项。您必须使用硬编码数字来定义宽度，而不是使用 float("inf") 之类的构造，因为过滤器不支持代理Python函数。例如：

trans-unit.source: The tower_credential module originally required the ssh_key_data to be the path to a ssh_key_file. In order to work like Tower/AWX, ssh_key_data now contains the content of the file. The previous behavior can be achieved with lookup('file', '/path/to/file').
trans-unit.target: 该 tower_credential 模块原本需要 ssh_key_data 是路径到ssh_key_file传递。为了像Tower / AWX一样工作， ssh_key_data 现在包含文件的内容。可以使用 lookup('file', '/path/to/file') 实现先前的行为。

trans-unit.source: The translation key contains an IP address to translate the address value above to. This key is optional.
trans-unit.target: 该 translation 键包含一个IP地址翻译的 address 上面的值。该键是可选的。

trans-unit.source: The type choice is available since Ansible version '2.10'.
trans-unit.target: 该 type 的选择是因为Ansible版“2.10”可用。

trans-unit.source: The type choice is available since Ansible version 2.10.
The type key can be set to galaxy, url, file, and git. If type is omitted, the name key is used to implicitly determine the source of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 该 type 键可设置为 galaxy ， url ， file 和 git 。如果省略 type ，则使用 name 键隐式确定集合的来源。

trans-unit.source: The type, control and module_path all must match a rule to be modified.
trans-unit.target: 该 type ， control 和 module_path 中都必须匹配规则进行修改。

trans-unit.source: The unable to open shell message is new in Ansible 2.3, it means that the ansible-connection daemon has not been able to successfully talk to the remote network device. This generally means that there is an authentication issue. See the “Authentication and connection issues” section in this document for more information.
trans-unit.target: 在 unable to open shell 的消息是新的Ansible 2.3，这意味着 ansible-connection 守护进程一直未能成功地聊到远程网络设备。通常，这意味着存在身份验证问题。有关更多信息，请参见本文档中的“身份验证和连接问题”部分。

trans-unit.source: The unable to open shell message is new in Ansible 2.3. This message means that the ansible-connection daemon has not been able to successfully talk to the remote network device. This generally means that there is an authentication issue. It is a “catch all” message, meaning you need to enable :ref:logging`a_note_about_logging` to find the underlying issues.
trans-unit.target: 在 unable to open shell 在Ansible 2.3的消息是新的。该消息表示 ansible-connection 守护程序无法成功与远程网络设备对话。通常，这意味着存在身份验证问题。这是一条“全部捕获”消息，这意味着您需要启用：ref：logging`a_note_about_logging`才能发现潜在的问题。

trans-unit.source: The unable to open shell message means that the ansible-connection daemon has not been able to successfully talk to the remote network device. This generally means that there is an authentication issue. It is a “catch all” message, meaning you need to enable logging to find the underlying issues.
trans-unit.target: 在 unable to open shell 消息意味着 ansible-connection 守护进程一直未能成功地聊到远程网络设备。通常，这意味着存在身份验证问题。这是一条“全部捕获”消息，这意味着您需要启用日志记录才能找到潜在的问题。

trans-unit.source: The url option for each server name must end with a forward slash /. If you do not set the API token in your Galaxy server list, use the --api-key argument to pass in the token to the ansible-galaxy collection publish command.
trans-unit.target: 每个服务器名称的 url 选项必须以正斜杠 / 结束。如果未在Galaxy服务器列表中设置API令牌，请使用 --api-key 参数将令牌传递给 ansible-galaxy collection publish 命令。

trans-unit.source: The username and password parameters are stored in plain text in the registry. Make sure the cleanup commands are run after the script finishes to ensure no credentials are still stored on the host.
trans-unit.target: 该 username 和 password 参数存储在注册表中的纯文本。确保脚本完成后运行清除命令，以确保主机上仍未存储任何凭据。

trans-unit.source: The var=value notation can only create strings or booleans. If you want to create lists/arrays or dictionary/hashes use var: [val1, val2].
trans-unit.target: 该 var=value 符号只能创建字符串或布尔值。如果要创建列表/数组或字典/哈希，请使用 var: [val1, val2] 。

trans-unit.source: The varnames lookup returns a list of variables that match “begin with my”.
trans-unit.target: 该 varnames 查找返回的变量列表匹配“首先 my ”。

trans-unit.source: The vars modifier indicates that the section contains variables assigned to members of the group.
trans-unit.target: 的 vars 修饰词表示该部分包含分配给该组的成员变量。
